nodes.bodyText: it's equal 3 in main.yaml, why we have different value here?
Because I have forgotten to change it in second place (with 2 we have instability in switch lost detection - possible false positive detection).
Could you revise the name? It's not obvious what "dumpGeneration", "actualGeneration" and "OfflineGenerationLag" in the context of SwitchFsm.
I have tried, don't think that it become more obvious. :(
Could you add some javadoc with description what this class is for?
